sentences.en: Hay fever is an affliction that arrives at an early age.
sentences.cn: 花粉热是一种早年易患的病。

sentences.en: What can we do when God Himself has sent us the affliction?
sentences.cn: 当上帝亲自给我们带来痛苦时，我们能做些什么呢？

sentences.en: It was a heavy affliction to them to see the beloved prince so stricken.
sentences.cn: 看到心爱的王子如此受折磨，他们感到非常痛苦。
